## Installation

You can install the released version of Rossmann from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("Rossmann")
```

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(Rossmann)
## basic example code
```
